page.title: 06Mr. Taylor - Bank Manager
page.content: Mr. G. Taylor is the manager of Barclays Bank. He gave Alex Barker and Richard Leeds a tour of the Bank. He pressed in the rightone of the 9,999 combinations which could be used to operate the airlock door (so called because only one of the doors can be opened at a time), and we entered the till area. Here, he showed us a machine which printed the money to be paid on cheques; the computer, which is linked to London, Gloucester and Manchester. Then he showed us a thing which enlarges information on peoples' accounts,which is printed incredibly small on sheets of plastic;by shining a light through it.The light along with the shadow it casts,goes through a lens,and is bounced onto a glass screen with a mirror.
